name: DealList
description: Displays deals in a sortable table format with open action

properties.name: deals
properties.description: Array of deal objects to display

properties.name: stageColors
properties.description: Optional object mapping stage names to colors

properties.name: onDealClick
properties.description: Callback when a deal row is clicked

properties.name: onOpenClick
properties.description: Callback when the open icon is clicked, receives entityName and primaryKey array

events.name: onDealSelect
events.description: Fired when a deal row is clicked

parameters.name: deal
parameters.description: The deal object that was clicked

events.name: onDealOpen
events.description: Fired when the open icon is clicked

parameters.name: primaryKey
parameters.description: Array of key-value pairs for composite primary key

functionalRequirements:
- Display deals in a clean table format
- Show deal name, account, stage, and amount
- Include open icon button for external navigation
- Show hover effects on rows
- Color-code stage badges
- Support row click for selection
technicalDesign: Renders deals in table format with hover states. Formats currency values. Includes Font Awesome icon for opening deals externally. Stage badges use dynamic colors from stageColors prop.
